title: MAXI CARDIGAN
desc: Knit wool-blend maxi cardigan with shawl collar. This straight-cut garment is embellished with a floral jacquard motif with contrasting-colour side bands. Completing the garment are metal Pegaso buttons and ribbed hems.• Regular fit• Shawl collar• Long sleeves• Fastened with Pegaso buttons• Patch pockets on the front• Made in Italy• The model is 5' 9½" (177 cm) tall and wears a size 40
